name: Technical Deep Dive
description: To assess the candidate's technical expertise, depth of knowledge, and hands-on experience.
instructions:
Instructions:

  1. In-Depth Technical Questions:

    • Conduct a 1-2 hour interview focusing on system design, software architecture, and real-world problem-solving.

    • Ask about past projects, challenges faced, and how they were resolved.

  2. Live Coding Session:

    • Provide a coding task to be completed during the interview.

    • Evaluate coding style, logical approach, and problem-solving under pressure.

name: System Design and Architecture
description: To evaluate the candidate's ability to design scalable, robust, and efficient systems.
instructions:
Instructions:

  1. System Design Problem:

    • Present a real-world problem relevant to the company’s domain.

    • Ask the candidate to design a system or component, considering scalability, reliability, and maintainability.

  2. Discussion and Evaluation:

    • Discuss the candidate's design choices, trade-offs, and technologies used.

    • Evaluate their understanding of system architecture, cloud infrastructure, and best practices.

name: Cultural Fit and Final Review
description: To ensure the candidate aligns with the company’s values, culture, and team dynamics.
instructions:
Instructions:

  1. Behavioral Interview:

    • Conduct a 1-hour interview focusing on behavioral questions and situational responses.

    • Assess the candidate’s alignment with the company’s values, teamwork, and conflict resolution skills.

  2. Team Meeting:

    • Arrange a meeting with potential team members.

    • Evaluate how well the candidate interacts with the team and fits into the company culture.

  3. Final Review:

    • Gather feedback from all interviewers.

    • Discuss the candidate's performance across all stages.

    • Make the final hiring decision.

name: Initial Screening
description: To evaluate the candidate's basic qualifications, cultural fit, and communication skills.
instructions:
Instructions:

  1. Resume Review:

    • Check the candidate's educational background, work experience, and relevant skills.

    • Look for experience with SaaS and software development methodologies.

  2. Phone/Video Screening:

    • Conduct a 30-minute interview to discuss the candidate’s resume and experience.

    • Assess communication skills and cultural fit.

    • Ask general questions about their motivation, career goals, and understanding of SaaS.

name: Technical Assessment
description: To evaluate the candidate's coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and knowledge of software engineering principles.
instructions:
Instructions:

  1. Online Coding Test:

    • Send a coding challenge via a platform like HackerRank or Codility.

    • Include questions on algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving.

  2. Review of Results:

    • Assess the quality of code, efficiency, and problem-solving approach.

    • Select candidates who meet the required technical standards.
